model

Interface ImmutablePiece

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractPiece, IPiece, JPiece, LPiece, OPiece, SPiece, TPiece, ZPiece

    public interface ImmutablePiece
    This interface defines the required operations of immutable Tetris pieces.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ImmutablePiece moveDown() 
      ImmutablePiece moveLeft() 
      ImmutablePiece moveRight() 
      ImmutablePiece rotateClockwise() 
      ImmutablePiece rotateCounterclockwise() 

    • Method Detail

      • moveLeft

        Returns:

        Returns:
        What piece results from moving you down?

      • rotateClockwise

        ImmutablePiece rotateClockwise()
        Returns:
        What piece results from rotating you clockwise?

      • rotateCounterclockwise

        ImmutablePiece rotateCounterclockwise()
        Returns:
        What piece results from rotating you counterclockwise?
